channel.title: Why does my dds spec make splashes on me and doesnt hurt enemy? and error
channel.description:
Ok when I use dds spec on my server it makes 4 splashes on me and just keeps doing it using specs nonstop and I get a error that says
[code]java.lang.nullpointerexception at client.gethit(client.java:1733 at client.getblockanim(client.java:2845 at npchandler.attackplayer(npchandler.java:1665 at npchandler.process(npchandler.java:2405 at process.run(process.java:619[/code]

item.title: Why does my dds spec make splashes on me and doesnt hurt enemy? and error
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
